name: Pong Medieval
description:
In this game, you are in a war between two castles in the medieval age, with exciting music, you need to control the cannon and barricade to protect your castle and destroy the enemy, it can be played both single-player and multiplayer.

It is recommended a monitor resolution equal or greater than 1600x900.

Credits

Game Design and Programming:

    Gustavo Oliveira de Carvalho [https://www.behance.net/gumegasonic]

Art:

    Lucila Raimundo Tuan

Sound:

    Victor Luciano de Souza
